thread.title: Spain's Abengoa strikes deal on capital increase, main shareholder loses control
thread.title_full: Spain's Abengoa strikes deal on capital increase, main shareholder loses control

title: Spain's Abengoa strikes deal on capital increase, main shareholder loses control
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Sep 24, 2015, 07:10 BST - UK Markets open in 50 mins. Spain's Abengoa strikes deal on capital increase, main shareholder loses control Reuters - UK Focus – 36 minutes ago 35.41 -0.12 
MADRID, 24 sep (Reuters) - Spanish energy company Abengoa said on Thursday its major creditors had agreed to back most of a 650 million euro ($728 million) capital hike, a vital deal providing funds to cut debt and cover cash flow needs. 
The rest of the cash will come from its main shareholder Inversion Corporativa and fund manager Waddell & Reed, the company said. Inversion Corporativa had agreed to cap its voting rights at 40 percent after the share issue, losing its majority status. ($1 = 0.8934 euros) (Reporting By Julien Toyer and Tomas Cobos, Editing by Sonya Dowsett) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
